name: Indiara Crowns and the temple of infinity
name_original: Indiara Crowns and the temple of infinity
description:
In an unknown forest...

The adventurous Indiara Crowns enter in the temple of infinity ! Use your brain and your logic to find the way out !

This game was originally created for the GeoJam  (2021)
Theme : "The other side".

Controls:
  • Move: WASD / Arrow Key
  • Jump : Space
  • Reset : R
  • Help : H

Credits
  • Programming and Game Design : Frelude
  • Graphics : Madélou
  • Music : Amiamiami
  • Font : https://www.dafont.com/geometry-soft-pro.font
  • Fractal (public domain pictures)
  • Sounds:  http://freesound.org
